column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////We ended up heading to Lou's after the river boat architectural cruise
column2: and thus unfortunately had hit prime time.  We were quoted over an hour's wait (1 hour 40 min?)
column3: but we put our name in because there didn't seem to be much around the area and where would we take a take-out pie?  So we put our pizza order in under the name on the reservation list.
